name: Emote-Overlay
description: This project is an overlay that shows emote streaks on the bottom left of the page. **_(Page dimensions are 1280px x 720px)_**   It can also show emotes randomly on screen if a chatter does !showemote (*emote_name*)   *This overlay can be used in streaming software like OBS*    The emotes are taken from Twitch, FFZ, BTTV, and optionally, 7TV.
